text.content: AVIS (Automated Visual Inspection System) transforms your smartphone into a precision inspection system for high-mix, low-volume manufacturing environments.

text.plain_text: AVIS (Automated Visual Inspection System) transforms your smartphone into a precision inspection system for high-mix, low-volume manufacturing environments.

text.content: This portable computer vision solution enables real-time verification of component configuration, markings, and surface conditions using cameras your teams already own.

text.plain_text: This portable computer vision solution enables real-time verification of component configuration, markings, and surface conditions using cameras your teams already own.

text.content: AVIS is a cutting-edge computer vision platform that leverages artificial intelligence to provide:

text.plain_text: AVIS is a cutting-edge computer vision platform that leverages artificial intelligence to provide:

text.content: Real-time visual inspection and quality control

text.plain_text: Real-time visual inspection and quality control

text.content: Seamless integration with existing manufacturing systems

text.plain_text: Seamless integration with existing manufacturing systems

text.content:
• 10mm Positional Accuracy
• 24hrs Setup Time
• 8sec Inspection Time
• 100% Offline Operation

text.plain_text:
• 10mm Positional Accuracy
• 24hrs Setup Time
• 8sec Inspection Time
• 100% Offline Operation

text.content: Achieve 10mm positional accuracy for component presence and alignment checks, ensuring consistent quality control across all manufacturing processes.

text.plain_text: Achieve 10mm positional accuracy for component presence and alignment checks, ensuring consistent quality control across all manufacturing processes.

text.content: Configure new part families in just 24 hours instead of weeks, dramatically reducing time-to-production for new components.

text.plain_text: Configure new part families in just 24 hours instead of weeks, dramatically reducing time-to-production for new components.

text.content: Complete inspections in just 8 seconds versus minutes with manual checking, increasing throughput without compromising quality.

text.plain_text: Complete inspections in just 8 seconds versus minutes with manual checking, increasing throughput without compromising quality.

text.content: 100% offline operation with no internet connection required, ensuring consistent performance in any manufacturing environment.

text.plain_text: 100% offline operation with no internet connection required, ensuring consistent performance in any manufacturing environment.

text.content: Transform everyday smartphones into powerful quality control tools, leveraging existing hardware investments.

text.plain_text: Transform everyday smartphones into powerful quality control tools, leveraging existing hardware investments.

text.content: Computer vision models work in sequence to validate assemblies and identify individual components with high accuracy.

text.plain_text: Computer vision models work in sequence to validate assemblies and identify individual components with high accuracy.

text.content: Identifies missing or extra components, incorrect orientation, and positional misalignment. Ensures accurate matching against expected configuration.

text.plain_text: Identifies missing or extra components, incorrect orientation, and positional misalignment. Ensures accurate matching against expected configuration.

text.content: Detects scratches, dents, paint pinholes, and coating defects. Validates identification labels, serial numbers, and other text-based markings.

text.plain_text: Detects scratches, dents, paint pinholes, and coating defects. Validates identification labels, serial numbers, and other text-based markings.

text.content: Connects with ERP, QMS, and PLM systems for streamlined workflows. Every inspection logged with timestamps and audit-ready records.

text.plain_text: Connects with ERP, QMS, and PLM systems for streamlined workflows. Every inspection logged with timestamps and audit-ready records.

text.content: Clear workspace with minimal background interference

text.plain_text: Clear workspace with minimal background interference

text.content: Network connection for initial setup and updates (optional for operation)

text.plain_text: Network connection for initial setup and updates (optional for operation)

text.content: Install Application - Download and install the AVIS app on your mobile device

text.plain_text: Install Application - Download and install the AVIS app on your mobile device

text.content: Configure Templates - Set up component templates and inspection parameters

text.plain_text: Configure Templates - Set up component templates and inspection parameters

text.content: Calibrate System - Perform initial calibration for accurate measurements

text.plain_text: Calibrate System - Perform initial calibration for accurate measurements

text.content: Test & Validate - Run test inspections to ensure proper operation

text.plain_text: Test & Validate - Run test inspections to ensure proper operation

text.content: AVIS transforms template configurations into real-time detection parameters. The setup process involves creating digital templates that define the expected configuration of your assemblies.

text.plain_text: AVIS transforms template configurations into real-time detection parameters. The setup process involves creating digital templates that define the expected configuration of your assemblies.

text.content: Define Assembly Zones - Divide your assembly into logical zones, with each zone managed by its own validation model

text.plain_text: Define Assembly Zones - Divide your assembly into logical zones, with each zone managed by its own validation model

text.content: Component Mapping - Map individual components within each zone, defining position, orientation, and acceptance criteria

text.plain_text: Component Mapping - Map individual components within each zone, defining position, orientation, and acceptance criteria

text.content: Quality Parameters - Set quality thresholds for surface condition, markings, and dimensional tolerances

text.plain_text: Quality Parameters - Set quality thresholds for surface condition, markings, and dimensional tolerances

text.content: Validation Testing - Test the configuration with known good and bad samples to ensure accuracy

text.plain_text: Validation Testing - Test the configuration with known good and bad samples to ensure accuracy

text.content: Important: Allow 24 hours for initial template configuration. This one-time setup replaces weeks of traditional programming and calibration.

text.plain_text: Important: Allow 24 hours for initial template configuration. This one-time setup replaces weeks of traditional programming and calibration.

text.content: Proper lighting is crucial for accurate inspection results:

text.plain_text: Proper lighting is crucial for accurate inspection results:

text.content: Maintain consistent lighting levels (500-1000 lux recommended)

text.plain_text: Maintain consistent lighting levels (500-1000 lux recommended)

text.content: Avoid shadows and reflections on inspection surfaces

text.plain_text: Avoid shadows and reflections on inspection surfaces

text.content: Use diffused lighting to minimize glare

text.plain_text: Use diffused lighting to minimize glare

text.content: Consider using LED panels for consistent color temperature

text.plain_text: Consider using LED panels for consistent color temperature

text.content: AVIS provides comprehensive assembly verification capabilities:

text.plain_text: AVIS provides comprehensive assembly verification capabilities:

text.content: The system detects and flags missing or misplaced components, guiding operators to precise corrections. Real-time inspection overlays provide confidence scores and visual feedback for every step of the process.

text.plain_text: The system detects and flags missing or misplaced components, guiding operators to precise corrections. Real-time inspection overlays provide confidence scores and visual feedback for every step of the process.

text.content: AVIS identifies and alerts for foreign objects present in the assembly zone, ensuring safety and compliance with manufacturing standards.

text.plain_text: AVIS identifies and alerts for foreign objects present in the assembly zone, ensuring safety and compliance with manufacturing standards.

text.content: Identifies scratches, dents, paint pinholes, and coating defects on component surfaces

text.plain_text: Identifies scratches, dents, paint pinholes, and coating defects on component surfaces

text.content: Validates identification labels, serial numbers, barcodes, and other text-based markings using OCR technology

text.plain_text: Validates identification labels, serial numbers, barcodes, and other text-based markings using OCR technology

text.content: Verifies component dimensions and geometric tolerances within specified limits

text.plain_text: Verifies component dimensions and geometric tolerances within specified limits

text.content: Validate both positional accuracy and surface condition across a mix of components - screws, knobs, and brackets. Assembly is divided into zones, with each zone managed by its own validation model.

text.plain_text: Validate both positional accuracy and surface condition across a mix of components - screws, knobs, and brackets. Assembly is divided into zones, with each zone managed by its own validation model.

text.content: Leverages machine learning ability to validate factory markings. A validation of a pipe is first detected by a defect-based model, after which the factory-applied label is read using text recognition functionality.

text.plain_text: Leverages machine learning ability to validate factory markings. A validation of a pipe is first detected by a defect-based model, after which the factory-applied label is read using text recognition functionality.

text.content: Generate complete digital criteria with uniform standards that ensure consistent outcomes, eliminating variability between inspectors. Automatically generates time-stamped evidence and exportable reports.

text.plain_text: Generate complete digital criteria with uniform standards that ensure consistent outcomes, eliminating variability between inspectors. Automatically generates time-stamped evidence and exportable reports.

text.plain_text: Issue: Blurry or unclear images affecting detection accuracy

text.content:
E001: Camera initialization failed - Check camera permissions
E002: Template not found - Verify template configuration
E003: Insufficient lighting - Adjust lighting conditions
E004: Network connection error - Check internet connectivity
E005: Processing timeout - Reduce image complexity or restart app

text.plain_text:
E001: Camera initialization failed - Check camera permissions
E002: Template not found - Verify template configuration
E003: Insufficient lighting - Adjust lighting conditions
E004: Network connection error - Check internet connectivity
E005: Processing timeout - Reduce image complexity or restart app
